Title: Enacts CJ's Law--oil and gas drilling workplace safety act
Summary: Enacts CJ's Law--oil and gas drilling workplace safety act; requires the enactment of rules and regulations for enhanced workplace safety and employee training for all oil and gas drilling operations in the state; provides that new permit holders should utilize union laborers or laborers with specific training; provides that employers shall report workplace accidents and the commissioner of the department of labor must publish a quarterly report on workplace accidents.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to enacting CJ's Law--oil and gas drilling workplace safety act
